name: City Create
tag_list: loca--business-listings, online-business-listings, online-business-directory, online-business-opportunity, home-business-opportunity, city-guide-site, local-city-guide, local-community-site, online-community-site, online-business-portal, online-community-
overview:
City Create offers a unique home business opportunity, allowing you to run your own online business directory and own your own city. City guides offer information on local news, weather, movies, local events and small business listings. Increasingly, people find what they need in their communities by searching local business listings online.

What sets City Create apart from other local city guide websites is the community. Your city guide will not only be an online business portal, but a local community site as well. The online community is a great way to bring people together to discuss your city and current events in your website forums.

Owning a city guide is a great online business opportunity that requires almost no investment. There are multiple ways to make money by owning your own city guide. Your city guide comes with a built in banner ad system, an online shopping cart and affiliate programs, so you can earn money with your home business directory through direct sales, selling ad space and affiliate marketing programs.

Getting started with this home business opportunity is easy. A city guide can be leased through City Create for a nominal fee. Your site is completely customizable. It will come with blogs, forums and classified categories for our local business directory. You can use all, some or none of these categories. Itâ€™s up to you. We ensure a high ranking in the search engines when people search for local information by managing the domains and subdomains. We are here to assist you in the initial set up and offer ongoing support.
